Dhītā Sutta：1．Dhītā Sutta.-Pasenadi visits the Buddha and grumbles because Mallikā has given birth to a daughter．The Buddha points out to him that a woman may prove a better offspring than a male．S.i.86．（de S.3.16）



2．Dhītā Sutta.-Incalculable is samsāra，and it is impossible to find one who，in his wanderings，has not lost a daughter．S.ii.190.
